pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation-Based Landscape Construction for Dynamical Systems // A toolbox for constructing potential landscapes for dynamical systems using Monte Carlo simulation. The method is based on the potential landscape definition by Wang et al. (2008) doi:10.1073/pnas.0800579105 (also see Zhou Li, 2016 doi:10.1063/1.4943096 for further mathematical discussions) and can be used for a large variety of models.
